title: Roe v. Wade Overturned While We Are Live on Air | Daily Best of June 24 | Rick & Bubba
description:
We react live on the air as news breaks of the Supreme Court decision to overturn Roe v. Wade. Joe Biden accidentally shows us his cue cards, and the childlike instructions are shocking. Dr. Fauci tells people to continue wearing masks indoors. Biden takes his mask off to shout celebrations of vaccinating children. And in sports, Arch Manning announces his plans to play football at the University of Texas.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
